attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This company is special to the British People...closing the stores on the High Street will create a hole that cannot be filled by any other retailer...and 30k people lose their jobs at this time of the year! Woolworths in some areas of Britain is as important as the village post office.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
